# Contributing Guidelines

Thank you for your interest in this project!

## ğŸ”’ Repository Permissions

Please note that this repository has strict access controls:

- **Public Access**: Anyone is welcome to clone, fork, and run this project locally.
- **Push Access**: Restricted to the repository owner (@carlos-2790) only.
- **Pull Requests**: Pull requests from external contributors are generally **not accepted** or merged.
- **Merges**: Only the repository owner can perform merges.

## ğŸ› ï¸ Local Development

You can freely work with this project locally:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/carlos-2790/chatbot-api-testing.git
cd chatbot-api-testing
docker-compose build
docker-compose run --rm chatbot-tests
```

## ğŸ› Issues

If you find a bug or have a suggestion, feel free to open an Issue for discussion, but please understand that code contributions cannot be merged directly.
